Data_Analysis: Write a Python program that performs in-depth analysis on a Pandas DataFrame, includes generating descriptive statistics, printing top 5 and bottom 5 rows of data, and identifying the data type in each column.
Data_Preprocess: Develop a Python script to preprocess a pandas dataframe, ensuring that it only includes rows with complete data (i.e., no missing values), and no duplicate entries.
Feature_Engineer: Write a Python program that encodes categorical features with label encoding and removes outliers in numerical features using IQR method, while also ensuring data balance and removal of unwanted features in a pandas dataframe.
